seo.title: About — SustainSage Group
seo.description: Bilingual coaches based in the UK. ICF-aligned, confidential by default, practical and culture-aware.

hero.title: Coaching for complex transitions
intro: SustainSage is led by bilingual coaches who have moved between Taiwan, Singapore, and the UK. We keep coaching steady, culturally aware, and grounded in practical experiments.
Every partnership begins with informed consent, shared language, and clarity on how we will work together.
chips: ICF-aligned practice keeps agreements, data care, and supervision transparent so trust can grow.
Lived experience across Asia-Pacific and the UK keeps culture and policy context in view.
No-drama experiments help you build momentum without burning out.

cards.title: From factories to quiet conversations
body: Before I became a coach, I spent years in manufacturing – leading three factories and around 1,400 people across Mainland China and Taiwan.

cards.title: Meet the bilingual coaches behind SustainSage
body: We bring supervision-informed coaching, policy literacy, and multilingual lived experience to every partnership.

cards.title: Values that shape every partnership
body: Gentle, ICF-aligned principles that keep each conversation calm, transparent, and culturally aware.

cards.title: Experiments that respect pace and context
body: Every partnership begins with informed consent, shared language, and clarity on how we will work together.

sections.title: Values that shape every partnership
sections.lead: Gentle, ICF-aligned principles that keep each conversation calm, transparent, and culturally aware.

cards.title: Authenticity
body: ICF-aligned practice keeps agreements, data care, and supervision transparent so trust can grow.

cards.title: Gentleness
body: We keep a calm cadence so experimentation feels kind, slow enough, and sustainable.

cards.title: Structure
body: Clear agreements, review points, and data boundaries help every partnership stay grounded.

cards.title: Cultural sensitivity
body: Lived experience across Asia-Pacific and the UK keeps multilingual nuance and policy context in view.

sections.title: Structures that keep our practice steady
sections.lead: Training, supervision, and bilingual partnerships that keep our work grounded and accountable.

cards.title: Context before action
body: We map systems, constraints, and access needs before suggesting experiments.

cards.title: Bilingual collaboration
body: Sessions move between English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese so nuance survives translation.

cards.title: Reflective practice
body: Monthly supervision and pause points keep bias, risk, and wellbeing in view.

cta.title: Ready to map your next step?
cta.body: Browse our coaching services or read the full coaching boundaries we uphold.
